entry.title: Markdown æµ‹è¯•æ–‡ç«
entry.content:
Markdownæ˜¯ä¸€ç§è½»é‡çº§æ ‡è®°è¯­è¨€ï¼Œåˆ›å§‹äººä¸ºçº¦ç¿°Â·æ ¼é²ä¼¯ï¼ˆè‹±è¯­ï¼šJohn Gruberï¼‰ã€‚å®ƒå…è®¸äººä»¬â€œä½¿ç”¨æ˜“è¯»æ˜“å†™çš„çº¯æ–‡æœ¬æ ¼å¼ç¼–å†™æ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œç„¶åè½¬æ¢æˆæœ‰æ•ˆçš„XHTMLï¼ˆæˆ–è€…HTMLï¼‰æ–‡æ¡£â€ã€‚

ä¸‰çº§æ ‡é¢˜æ˜¾ç¤º

entry.title: data-visual-var-dark.css
entry.content:
data-visual-var-dark.css

{
    /* shadow */
    --dv-box-shadow: 0 8px 20px 0 rgba(51, 135, 255, 0.72), 0 12px 32px 4px rgba(51, 135, 255, 0.36);
    --dv-box-shadow-dark: 0 8px 16px -8px #3387ff, 0 12px 32px 0 #3387ff, 0 16px 48px 16px rgba(51, 135, 255, 0.72);
    --dv-box-shadow-light: 0 0 12px 0 rgba(51, 135, 255, 0.72);
    --dv-box-shadow-lighter: 0 0 6px 0 rgba(51, 135, 255, 0.72);
    /* background */
    --dv-color-background-base: #000b1a;
    --dv-color-background-overlay: #000b1a;
    --dv-color-background-page: #000b1a;
    /* border */
    --dv-color-border-base: rgba(68, 136, 208, 0.2);
    --dv-color-border-dark: rgba(68, 136, 208, 0.15);
    --dv-color-border-darker: rgba(68, 136, 208, 0.15);
    --dv-color-border-extra-light: rgba(68, 136, 208, 0.35);
    --dv-color-border-light: rgba(68, 136, 208, 0.25);
    --dv-color-border-lighter: rgba(68, 136, 208, 0.3);
    /* danger */
    --dv-color-danger: #f84439;
    --dv-color-danger-10: #190706;
    --dv-color-danger-20: #320e0b;
    --dv-color-danger-30: #4a1411;
    --dv-color-danger-50: #7c221c;
    --dv-color-danger-70: #ae3028;
    --dv-color-danger-80: #c6362e;
    --dv-color-danger-110: #d15e58;
    /* fill */
    --dv-color-fill-base: rgba(68, 136, 208, 0.1);
    --dv-color-fill-blank: rgba(68, 136, 208, 0.1);
    --dv-color-fill-dark: rgba(68, 136, 208, 0.05);
    --dv-color-fill-darker: rgba(68, 136, 208, 0.05);
    --dv-color-fill-extra-light: rgba(68, 136, 208, 0.25);
    --dv-color-fill-light: rgba(68, 136, 208, 0.15);
    --dv-color-fill-lighter: rgba(68, 136, 208, 0.2);
    /* index */
    --dv-color-index: #00deff;
    --dv-color-index-10: #001619;
    --dv-color-index-20: #002c33;
    --dv-color-index-30: #00434d;
    --dv-color-index-50: #006f7f;
    --dv-color-index-70: #009cb3;
    --dv-color-index-80: #00b2cc;
    --dv-color-index-110: #33e5ff;
    /* info */
    --dv-color-info-10: #000b1a;
    --dv-color-info-100: #0054cc;
    --dv-color-info-20: #001533;
    --dv-color-info-30: #001f4c;
    --dv-color-info-50: #003580;
    --dv-color-info-70: #0049b2;
    --dv-color-info-110: #73767a;
    /* primary */
    --dv-color-primary: #0069ff;
    --dv-color-primary-10: #000b1a;
    --dv-color-primary-20: #001533;
    --dv-color-primary-30: #001f4c;
    --dv-color-primary-50: #003580;
    --dv-color-primary-70: #0049b2;
    --dv-color-primary-80: #0054cc;
    --dv-color-primary-110: #3387ff;
    /* success */
    --dv-color-success: #15f3a3;
    --dv-color-success-10: #021a11;
    --dv-color-success-20: #043322;
    --dv-color-success-30: #064c33;
    --dv-color-success-50: #0b8056;
    --dv-color-success-70: #0fb277;
    --dv-color-success-80: #11cc89;
    --dv-color-success-110: #56e7b3;
    /* text */
    --dv-color-text-disable: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
    --dv-color-text-placeholder: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    --dv-color-text-primary: #fff;
    --dv-color-text-regular: #cfd3dc;
    --dv-color-text-secondary: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
    /* warning */
    --dv-color-warning: #fdbd00;
    --dv-color-warning-10: #1a1300;
    --dv-color-warning-20: #332600;
    --dv-color-warning-30: #4b3800;
    --dv-color-warning-50: #7f5f00;
    --dv-color-warning-70: #b18400;
    --dv-color-warning-80: #ca9700;
    --dv-color-warning-110: #ebbf3d;
    /* text-shadow */
    --dv-text-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

entry.title: Hello Cat
entry.content:
This is a picture of our sleepy cat friend Luna. Luna is a funny cat, of course a bit spoiled, too (which cat isnâ€™tâ€¦). She only wants to drink running water from the tap and she just ignores her water bowl. She loves it, if you open her all the doors in the house and she can explore every room very slowly, of course she is never in a rush. If the sun is out, she loves to sleep in an empty flower pot all day, not moving a bit. If I watch Luna I wish to be a cat, too, at some times ğŸ™‚

#A little Headline to this Post
Ridiculus et ac dignissim? Sagittis, sociis a mid elit dapibus integer elit dapibus hac facilisis, magna vel pulvinar habitasse, urna tempor porttitor, lacus facilisis adipiscing scelerisque mauris lorem, elementum ac ac. Auctor diam, urna. Sed. Adipiscing magna vel? Habitasse risus amet? Dolor elementum, amet nec scelerisque ultricies, lundium porta, velit cras? Pulvinar nec diam lorem massa et ac magnis elementum lacus amet purus. A vel dapibus aliquet ac duis placerat rhoncus? Mattis hac odio lectus, odio turpis ut, a mus amet nascetur aliquet, hac adipiscing nec penatibus, nec amet hac ac, purus dictumst phasellus dis magna purus porttitor arcu? Lacus aliquam odio aenean dapibus pellentesque ac urna? Integer etiam, ac! Urna placerat hac? Lorem scelerisque! In ac? Vel est.

#One more h4 Headline
In cum sit adipiscing augue egestas, integer pulvinar platea. Magna? Nascetur! Natoque tincidunt enim! Lundium dolor sit purus magnis, pulvinar et amet, ultricies? Aliquet enim turpis massa turpis aenean augue. Magnis pulvinar duis! Placerat cras? Integer ac elementum? Pulvinar! Pulvinar adipiscing! Cum! Cursus tincidunt, in. Duis cras? Nunc tempor nec magna ultricies et, et nec a? Et? Mauris nunc in nascetur adipiscing vel, risus magna, dictumst sed! Integer est natoque placerat? Rhoncus sit ut odio adipiscing! Scelerisque, elementum lectus ac quis dignissim dolor! Magna. Odio lacus scelerisque est magnis aenean dapibus! Amet tempor placerat ultricies. Ac parturient rhoncus pid! Mattis proin! Elit tempor parturient dis ut natoque tempor a? Porta. Sit! Porttitor pulvinar, in turpis! Urna turpis nascetur vel.

entry.title: Hello Gridea
entry.content:
ğŸ‘ æ¬¢è¿ä½¿ç”¨ Gridea ï¼
âœï¸ Gridea ä¸€ä¸ªé™æ€åšå®¢å†™ä½œå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ã€‚ä½ å¯ä»¥ç”¨å®ƒæ¥è®°å½•ä½ çš„ç”Ÿæ´»ã€å¿ƒæƒ…ã€çŸ¥è¯†ã€ç¬”è®°ã€åˆ›æ„... ...

ğŸ’» ä½ å¯ä»¥åœ¨ Windowsï¼ŒMacOS æˆ– Linux è®¾å¤‡ä¸Šä½¿ç”¨æ­¤å®¢æˆ·ç«¯

ğŸŒ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ ğ–¦ğ—‚ğ—ğ—ğ—ğ–» ğ–¯ğ–ºğ—€ğ–¾ğ—Œ æˆ– Coding Pages å‘ä¸–ç•Œå±•ç¤ºï¼Œæœªæ¥å°†æ”¯æŒæ›´å¤šå¹³å°

ğŸ’¬ ä½ å¯ä»¥è¿›è¡Œç®€å•çš„é…ç½®ï¼Œæ¥å…¥ Gitalk æˆ– DisqusJS è¯„è®ºç³»ç»Ÿ
